title.narrative: Thematic Programme Governance and Rights, engagement

description.narrative: To contribute promoting rule of law, accountability & rights for poor and vulnerable people. This will be done in partnership with duty bearers, right-based NGOs, watchdogs and international organisations.

participating-org.narrative: Bangladesh Legal Aid and Service Trust

description.narrative: FL §06.32.02.11 Bangladesh

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

title.narrative: 1.1 Number of cases with judgements for the poor, socially excluded and marginalized women, men and children and workers (including litigation)

description.narrative: Outcome 1 Statement: "Increased access to justice for poor, socially excluded and marginalized women, men and children as well as workers through informal justice and increasingly responsive formal justice system."

title.narrative: 2.1. No of initiatives taken to improve laws/policies/practices/ institutional reforms on justice and human rights for marginalized groups supported by BLAST with input for changes

description.narrative: Outcome 2 Statement: "Legal and Policy framework strengthened through advocacy for reforms and practice level changes embedded among duty bearers in upholding the rights of the poor and disadvantaged in particular women, children and workers."
